Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the value of the "Black Diamond Collection" Disney films on VHS by stating that they are worth thousands of dollars, particularly "Beauty and the Beast."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that these VHS tapes are worth thousands of dollars.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the high asking prices on eBay listings reflect the actual value of the tapes, without considering whether buyers are willing to pay those prices.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the high asking prices on eBay do not reflect the actual market value, as buyers are not bidding anywhere close to those prices.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the "Black Diamond Collection" Disney VHS tapes are not actually selling for thousands of dollars, as indicated by the lack of bidding activity on eBay.
Understate: The claim understates the actual value of the VHS tapes by suggesting that they are worth thousands of dollars, when in reality, they are not selling for such high prices.
Falters at times: The claim falters in providing accurate information about the value of the VHS tapes, as it relies on misleading eBay listings without considering the lack of buyer interest.
